attributes.action: limit the level of volume from car stereos and exhaust pipes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are far too many people modifying their cars with large exhaust pipes, and deliberately driving around with music very high so we can all have the (dis)pleasure of listening to their music and car engines from inside our own homes.  It is an obvious form of antisocial behaviour and one which seems to be ignored by the government.
